questions: What are the expected properties for a given task?
What type of data is expected for the "id" property?
What is an example of a valid "id" property?
answer:
## Expected properties
!!! Tip

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name   | Expected type   | Example                                               |
|--------|-----------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| id     | string          | Checkout ID: "5678-efgh-1234-abcd"                                 |
